mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, John, 1790-1862
Tyler, Julia Gardiner, 1820-1889
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Brief business note asking Gardiner to give enclosed check to portrait artist; predicts hard times due to bad crop. Including Julia [Gardiner] Tyler, "Villa Margarett," [Hampton, Va.], to Col. David L. Gardiner, n.p. Asks her brother to have Margaret's portrait sent as soon as possible and to put it directly in the care of the steamer's captain. Autograph Letter Signed.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1858 August 21, John Tyler, Villa Margarett, Hampton, Virginia to David L. Gardiner
